Name: Prince Charlie
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cognac and honey with sweet and sourness in harmony.
Nutrition: One serving of Prince Charlie contains 164 calories
